tasks.task: Construct an automated crop farm using various in-game materials and mechanisms.
subtasks: Gather required materials (water buckets, blocks, dirt, glass, hoppers, redstone, repeater, button, dispensers, chests, crop seeds).
Build a double chest at the farm’s base and connect a hopper to one chest.
Create an 8x8 field of dirt and an 8x7 field adjacent to it.
Construct a water trough around the farm area using chosen blocks to retain water.
Ensure the water flow by placing water buckets in designated dispensers along the trough.
Frame the farm perimeter with a two-block-high wall to contain crops and water.
Set up a redstone circuit with a button to activate the water dispensers.
Position a repeater to extend redstone power to all dispensers.
Plant crops in the prepared fields and ensure their automatic harvesting when the system is activated.
Monitor the chest for harvested crops and replant fields as necessary.
